The [[Sound Four]] activate their [[Sound Four's Cursed Seals|second stage Cursed Seals]] and create a four-way barrier formation that pulses out dark energy. The four [[shinobi]] [[fūinjutsu|seal]] the opponent inside the barrier formation, creating an erupting explosion of dark energy and leaving no trace of their target.

[[pl:Naraku Meijin]]
